topic_1.topic: What is your reaction to the growing role of AI in daily life?

A.stance: Very excited about the potential benefits

B.stance: Excited but equally cautious about the risks

C.stance: Deeply worried about the impact of AI on society

topic_2.topic: How do you feel about AI replacing human jobs?

A.stance: Optimistic that it will lead to new opportunities

B.stance: Mixed feelings as there are both benefits and drawbacks

C.stance: Alarmed that it will harm job security and livelihoods

topic_3.topic: What are your thoughts on the influence of AI over personal decision making?

A.stance: Encouraging as it offers helpful guidance

B.stance: Wary as it is useful but raises ethical questions

C.stance: Disturbing as it erodes personal autonomy

topic_4.topic: How concerned are you about companies collecting your personal data?

A.stance: Not concerned as it is the cost of convenience

B.stance: Somewhat concerned but privacy is negotiable

C.stance: Very concerned as it is an invasion of privacy
